00084 void AnalyzerWindow::Plot(PhotonMap* map, TShape* shape, unsigned int u, unsigned int v)
00085 {
00086 
00087         m_plot = new SurfacePlot(this);
00088 
00089     Flux flux(*m_plot, map, shape);
00090 
00091     flux.setMesh(u,v);
00092     flux.setDomain(0,100,0,100);
00093     flux.setMinZ(0);
00094         
00095     flux.create();
00096         
00097 
00098         
00099     for (unsigned i=0; i!=m_plot->coordinates()->axes.size(); ++i)
00100     {

00103         }
